isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 21-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURE - BRUSHES AND BRUSH HOLDER

svcproc.title: BRUSHES AND BRUSH HOLDER
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 14 for Item numbers in parentheses.

step1.para: Brush holder assembly must be removed to service brushes or to access regulator for further checks. Loosen or remove nut and connector from regulator stud, then remove insulated regulator attaching screws (Item 3) (one of these screws may have already been removed to disconnect diode trio). Finally, remove brush pivot screw (Item 4). Lift brush holder assembly (Item 11) from housing, taking care not to bend diode trio lead strap if still in place.

Check brushes and leads for excessive wear, breakage, etc. If necessary to replace, note routing of lead wires and position of lead clips (Item 10) for later assembly; brushes are identical but leads and clips are positioned differently. Carefully remove brush pin (Item 2) to release brushes. Remove brushes (Item 1) and spacer (Item 8) one at a time, placing fingers around springs (Item 9) to prevent loss. It may be necessary to spread the brush lead clips (Item 10) slightly to disengage retaining tabs.
